title: Catch the Wind
creator_credit: University of Western Australia and University of Western Australia. Human Movement and Recreation Studies Department
brief_description: Catch the Wind is a guide to dinghy sailing designed for instructors, schools, sail-training institutes and beginners. It is designed to provide a thorough and entertaining introduction to the basics of sailing.
creator_credit_for_label: University of Western Australia and University of Western Australia. Human Movement and Recreation Studies Department
